title: Court Kacheri
overview: In a chaotic district court of rural India, the son of a legendary lawyer wrestles with his unwanted inheritance while cases expose the messy truth behind local justice.

tv.episodeOverview: As Param fights to escape to Canada, every step - money, exams, paperwork - feels impossible. But he won't give up. Meanwhile, the divorce case he botched spirals into a courtroom war. Suraj, chasing his dream of independence, hits a financial wall and faces a tough, morally gray decision. With no easy exits, both men must confront the cost of chasing freedom.
